title: Conway's Game of Life
Ht-line1: A live cell with fewer than two live neighbours dies by underpopulation.
Ht-line2: A live cell with two/three live neighbours lives on to the next generation.
Ht-line3: A live cell more than three live neighbours dies by overpopulation.
Ht-line4: A dead cell with three live neighbours becomes a live cell by reproduction.
Ht-line5: A fixed cell will stay their type no matter what their neighbors are.
